column2: The disciples of Nagash spread his influence wherever they go. And where the power of Nagash is on the rise, the dead won't find rest easily.
Buried under the sands, countless forgotten legions wait for Nagash to call them to arms once again.
Buried under the sands, countless forgotten legions wait for Nagash to call them to arms once again.

The towering frame of a skeletal giant can be seen far and wide on the battlefield. As such they are perfectly suited to serve as a conduit to channel the dark magic from the necromancer to his troops, anchoring them in the mortal world.
Larenscheld resurrected the Dread King in exchange for immortality - and he received it, in a way. However it came in a different form than he expected.
Larenscheld has been granted the ability to call forth vengeful spirits in the shape of skulls from the realms beyond the mortal veil to torment the living.
Even if the body perishes, his mind and magic will persist to haunt those who bested him.
The mortal body is but a shell that holds back true greatness and may be discarded at will.
